an10.114:1.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabbam.
an10.114:2.1: Katamo ca, bhikkhave, adhammo, katamo ca dhammo, katamo ca anattho, katamo ca attho?
an10.114:3.3: ye ca micchaditthipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:3.4: sammaditthipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:4.3: ye ca micchasankappapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:4.4: sammasankappapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:5.3: ye ca micchavacapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:5.4: sammavacapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:6.3: ye ca micchakammantapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:6.4: sammakammantapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:7.3: ye ca micchaajivapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:7.4: sammaajivapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:8.3: ye ca micchavayamapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:8.4: sammavayamapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:9.3: ye ca micchasatipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:9.4: sammasatipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:10.3: ye ca micchasamadhipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:10.4: sammasamadhipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:11.3: ye ca micchananapaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:11.4: sammananapaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:12.3: ye ca micchavimuttipaccaya aneke papaka akusala dhamma sambhavanti, ayam anattho;
an10.114:12.4: sammavimuttipaccaya ca aneke kusala dhamma bhavanaparipurim gacchanti, ayam attho.
an10.114:13.3: Adhammanca viditva dhammanca, anatthanca viditva atthanca yatha dhammo yatha attho tatha patipajjitabban’ti,
an10.114:13.4: iti yam tam vuttam, idametam paticca vuttan”ti.
